Title: An Act Changing the Name of the Baguio General Hospital in Baguio City to Dr. Efrain C. Montemayor Medical Center
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 175
An Act Changing the Name of the Baguio General Hospital in Baguio City to Dr. Efrain C. Montemayor Medical Center
Section 1. The name of the Baguio General Hospital located in Baguio City is hereby changed to Dr. Efrain Montemayor Medical Center.
Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: February 12, 1982
